snippet.title: Arcade Racing Legends - Trailer Preorder - Dreamcast | PixelHeart
snippet.description:
🕹️ 🚗💨Get your old Dreamcast's engine warmed up and show off your driving skills as you take the wheel of one of the dozens of legendary cars included in the Arcade Racing Legends game! 

Independent retro game of the year, developed for the 20th anniversary of the console by the publisher PixelHeart and financed via Kickstarter with more than 300 contributors.

🏁Features: Duel 2 players / Career mode / Time trial race / More than 15 vehicles / 6 Circuits / Musics original electro, Punk-Rock.🏁

Release scheduled for November 13th 2020.
(The game images are not final. The game is still in development)

Arcade Racing Legends - Dreamcast compatible game.
Limited to 3000 numbered copies + Certificate of authenticity Official game JoshProd / PixelHeart
💳ALL VERSIONS available here:
➡️PixelHeart: https://www.pixelheart.eu/shop

#Racing #Race #Arcadegame #RacingGame #Retrogaming #retrogamer #PixelArt #Dreamcast #SegaDreamcast #IntuitiveComputer #JoshProd #PixelHeart #VideoGamesNewYork #PlayAsia

Creation by Intuitive Computer.
Producer / Publisher: https://www.pixelheart.eu and JoshProd

🎮SUBSCRIBE! https://bit.ly/33PpWEH (Thanks)
The official shop PixelHeart: https://www.pixelheart.eu/shop
